resources.string: Please be as detailed as possible. What did you expect and what happened instead?
To help us fix the problem, your report will include a list of steps to reproduce the issue.
All app screens have been deleted.
The list of app screens you visited will only be used to help us reproduce the problem you’re reporting.
How can we improve your experience using this app?
When the alarm is ON", SmartHalo will arm its alarm as soon as you leave your bike. It'll disarm automatically when you come near SmartHalo with the app opened."
When the alarm is ACTIVE, any persistent tampering with your bike will trigger a loud alarm.
"Phone out of battery? You can activate and deactivate the alarm manually. Just input your tapcode on SmartHalo's touch surface."
"Please set a passcode for your device before turning the alarm on. Your tapcode allows you to deactivate SmartHalo's Alarm should your phone run out of batteries."
Please connect to your SmartHalo to change your tapcode
Please connect to your SmartHalo to change the alarm state
While you were away, your alarm went off %1$s
"To set the alarm's sensitivity, please update your SmartHalo's firmware to the latest version."
Your tapcode allows you to deactivate SmartHalo’s Alarm should your phone run out of batteries. Just tap the Morse-like code on the touch surface and you’re good to go.
An error occurred while setting your tapcode. Please try again.
When Assistant is ON, SmartHalo will notify you of incoming SMS and Calls with its center light.
Get notifications directly on your SmartHalo and never miss a message again! Choose the apps you want notifications for.
You need to accept permissions for 3rd party notifications to work.
Choose the kind of notifications you get on your SmartHalo
Trigger your favourite features by tapping on your SmartHalo.
This is the last location you left your bike.
Location and Bluetooth permissions are required to connect to SmartHalo
Bluetooth not enabled. Click to enable.
Bluetooth permissions are missing. Click to fix.
If you want Call notifications, call state is required.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.

"Your email is not confirmed yet. Your device will be associated to your account so we want to make sure you will be able to access it. If you didn't get the confirmation message check your spam folder or select \"%1$s\"."
Are you sure you want to delete this favourite?

"Congrats on your brand new SmartHalo!
Hold on, I’m getting it ready for you. This will take around 10 minutes but future updates will be way faster.
You can do something else in the meantime, as it'll run in the background. Just keep your phone next to your device please."
"It seems that your SmartHalo has a firmware issue. Let's update it and fix it."
Since you are a Beta Tester, updating is mandatory.
IMPORTANT": Stay in SmartHalo's range during the update."
Are you sure you wish to cancel the firmware update?
Your SmartHalo will restart during the update process
"All done! Now check your device, I'll show you the basics of how to interact with it. You can also do this later, by accessing it in the top left menu."
"Your SmartHalo's battery is too low. Please plug it in to update."
Make sure to remain near SmartHalo during the update process.
Think of it as a tune-up - do it occasionally to help your device run smoother and get new features.
"Hold on, I'm updating SmartHalo, this could take up to 3 minutes."
Are you sure you want to cancel?
Be the first to leave a comment.
We will need your e-mail to keep you posted with the updates.
Something went wrong while trying to add your comment.
Please enter a valid email address.
Something went wrong while trying to add your feature.
We will keep you posted with the updates
Check your connection and try again.
We will need your e-mail to keep you posted with the updates.
Make sure to write clear title and description.
Help me SmartHalo, you are my only hope!
Are you sure you would like to delete these rides? This action cannot be undone
Are you sure you would like to delete this ride? This action cannot be undone
When Fitness is ON, SmartHalo tracks you as soon as you bike. It stops automatically
SPEED RELATIVE TO DEFINED MAX SPEED
Your rides are being uploaded to Strava
"Looks like you haven't connected your Strava account yet."
"SmartHalo 2 won't display your metrics while you ride. Tap to fix"
"SmartHalo 2 won't display your metrics while you ride. Do you wish to turn Fitness back on?"
Fitness tracking is currently set to OFF.
Turning Fitness off will disable metrics display on SmartHalo 2. Turn off anyway?
Turning Fitness off will disable fitness metrics display
Your ride is being uploaded to Strava
Are you sure you want to forget this device? This will reset it and allow anyone to connect to it.
An error occurred while forgetting your device. Please try again.
Please connect to your SmartHalo to forget it.
An email has been sent to this address
An error occurred, please try again.
No internet connection, please try again.
An error occurred while processing your GPX file
Phone number is optional and will be used only for troubleshooting purposes as related to this issue.
Something in the app is broken or doesn’t work as expected
New ideas or desired enhancements for this app
Please enter a valid US phone number.
Post an idea for a new feature and vote on others
Stay on the latest version to have access to all the fixes and features.
Tap on the floating button to report a problem or suggest an improvement.
Take a screenshot to report a problem or suggest an improvement.
Shake your device to report a problem or suggest an improvement.
Do a two finger swipe from right to left to report a bug or feedback.
Thank you for helping us improve our app. We are looking forward to your feedback and bug reports.
We are always happy to hear your thoughts.
Your thoughts will influence better future updates.
Your feedback will help us build a better app.
Remove an existing attachment to add a new one.
Are you sure you want to discard this report?
Please upload a file less than %d MB
"Couldn't capture screenshot due to low memory"
Survey cannot be submitted without an answer.
It delights us hearing your thoughts!

We love to hear your feedback
Shake your device to talk to us.
"We've received your feedback. Thank you for helping us make %s better."

We love to hear your feedback
Swipe with 2 fingers to talk to us.
Video Encoder is busy encoding other video
"Couldn't encode video due to low memory"
Please upload a video that is less than 1 minute in duration.
We’d love to hear from you
Can you help us do better by filling this brief survey?
Make sure the two brackets are the correct distance apart and are levelled evenly. You can use the centering card to guide you.

Hey, you have a high stem. No worries "if it's lower than 15 mm"", SmartHalo will still fit. There are a few things you'll have to change with the mounting base. Hey, you have a high stem. No worries, if it's lower than 15 mm, SmartHalo will still fit. There are a few things you'll have to change with the mounting base. Don't worry, this is still something you only need to do once."
Set the short screws aside and grab the 4 long screws.
Keep all of the parts", you'll still need the same rubber inserts, brackets and locking tabs."

string.name: instruction_highstem_remove_screws_title
string.b: Step 2: Remove the screws and locking tabs

resources.string: The spacers" will elevate your SmartHalo so that it doesn't hit the stem of your bike."
The mounting base stays permanently on your bike while the SmartHalo device is easily removed with your HaloKey
One side at a time, lightly snug the assembly together using the short screws. Make sure to place the locking tabs before inserting the screws.
Keep the screws loose so that you can adjust the brackets.

1. Align the lock symbol on the HaloKey" with the lock symbol on SmartHalo and keep it attached 2. Hook the "left side of SmartHalo onto the left" metal locking tab 3. Lower the "right side of SmartHalo over the right" locking tab 4. Remove the "HaloKey
After removing the key, you may need to wiggle your SmartHalo from side to side to engage the lock.
These are what your SmartHalo locks into.
IMPORTANT: The long screws are only used if you have a large stem. Do not use them for now, as they may damage your brackets.
"Let's start by installing the "mounting base. This takes around 15 minutes, but is only done once.
Congrats! The mounting bracket is now installed on your bike.
Take note: There will be parts left over" that weren't used for your "mounting bracket. We recommend that you hold onto these in case you need them in the future.
Press the rubber inserts into the brackers by aligning the rubber tips with the respective socket shape.
Measure your handlebar with the handlebar tool. This will determine if you need rubber inserts. Select the insert that fits your handlebar the best.
Gather all 4 rubber inserts marked with the letter %1$s.
When both sides are centered with your stem and levelled with each other, tighten the screws but be sure not to over-torque.
VERY IMPORTANT: Do not use your full force as over-tightening could damge the lower brackets.

1. Align the lock symbol on the HaloKey" with the lock symbol on SmartHalo and keep it attached 2. Pull up on the "right side of SmartHalo to detach the right" side from the locking tab 3. Unhook the "left" side of SmartHalo from the left locking tab 4. Remove the "HaloKey and charge
You may need to wiggle your SmartHalo from side to side with the HaloKey attached when unlocking it from your bike.
Please connect to a SmartHalo 2 to view touch demo
Look at your SmartHalo 2 to view the demo
" The ItemAnimators library comes with a huge collections of pre-created Animators for your RecyclerView. "
When Auto Light is ON", SmartHalo's front light turns on automatically at night. It also always "turns off on its own" when you're done riding."
Two short taps" on top surface"
"Send your rides from SmartHalo to Strava so you never have to press the “Record” button again."
"This integration will allow you to manage and share your activities between SmartHalo and Strava."
Your Strava account is now linked to your SmartHalo account
"SmartHalo 2 won't display your metrics while you ride. Tap to fix"
"SmartHalo 2 won't display your metrics while you ride. Do you wish to turn Location ON?"
Ride a few meters to get a heading
You need to ride a few meters before SmartHalo shows you the heading. Once you do, SmartHalo will show you the way. Try it!
Enter a destination or long tap on the map. Then, tuck your phone away and let SmartHalo guide you.
Follow heading on SmartHalo towards your itinerary for %1$s
"Follow heading on SmartHalo towards your itinerary's start for %1$s"
Would you like to start at the nearest maneuver?
You have arrived at your destination
Please wait while we find the best route.
Are you sure? This will become your new default device. You will still be the only one able to connect to your old device until you reconnect to it and explicitly forget it (resets the password).
You should see a green light flash once on your SmartHalo.
To wake up your SmartHalo, plug it into a USB port.
*Important : Some wall chargers may not wake your SmartHalo up, however computers always will.
Your email address is already taken by another account.
BLE is not supported by your device!
Some permissions to connect to your SmartHalo are missing. Please turn on all permissions.
"Fitness tracking is currently set to OFF. SmartHalo 2 won't display your metrics while you ride. Do you wish to turn Fitness back on?"
Please charge me by plugging me in a USB port.
All done, time to jump in!
I recommend you start by checking out the top menu", where you'll be able to connect to your device and get help"
"Once you're connected, have fun discovering all features by navigating the "bottom menu!
Hey, it happens to the best of us. Just enter the email linked to your account and we’ll send you a link to create a new password:
What can we help you with?
"I can't get SmartHalo off my bike"
SmartHalo is hitting the stem of my bike
"The lock feels stuck (it's not sliding on)"
"There could be a few reasons for this, let's get more specific."

"Make sure you're using the HaloKey to clip in the device, it cannot be locked in without it.""
You might need to wiggle SmartHalo a bit to lock your device with your HaloKey. If it still doesn't work, try re-aligning the mounting base."

"Once you clip SmartHalo with your HaloKey, make sure you wiggle your device a bit after removing the HaloKey to secure the locking mechanicsm.
Check to see if the stem of your bike is interfering with your device. If the stem is too high, you'll need to make a quick modification to the mounting base. If this is the problem,"
SmartHalo is clipping in but releases right away, even when the HaloKey is removed
Try wiggling your device a few times and try removing it again with your HaloKey. It can take a few times to loosen up the locking mechanism at first.
Email and password combination is invalid
This is to provide more accurate fitness metrics. 📈
"Fitness will be less precise if you don't fill in this section."
You must be 16 to use SmartHalo.
This info is to create your account and login. 🔑
I collect some data to provide more accurate fitness metrics and to better understand how people use our app to improve it
I use your location for navigation and fitness
I don’t sell any data to marketers
I might share anonymised data with third parties that aim to improve cycling infrastructure
"Before I make your bike smarter, I need you to check out the terms of use. Here’s a quick summary:"
Show me the full Terms of use
I need Call permissions if you want me to show you incoming calls and their names (with Contact permission).
"I'll never intercept calls, make calls or read your call history. This is strictly to warn you of incoming calls and have the caller ID show up on your device."
Since I connect seamlessly to your device while the app is running in the background, I require your location at all times.
Important:" This is used only to run features; I never track your location while you're not riding. SmartHalo won't work properly without setting location to Allow all the time."
Important: To provide location permission, select Allow while using the app.
To use SmartHalo, you need to provide a few permissions. ✅
First is the Location permission.📍 I use this to:
Pinpoint the last known location of your bike when you park it
Connect to your device via Bluetooth.

Since I connect seamlessly to your device while the app is running in the background, I require your location at all times" to function properly – I never use that information to track you while you'e not riding."
"You won't receive incoming notifications while riding."
I need Notification permissions so that I can display incoming notifications while you ride. 💬
"I'll never read the content of your notifications."
SMS notifications are on by default. You can configure other notification types in the Assistant page
"SmartHalo 2 won't display your metrics while you ride. Tap to fix"
"SmartHalo 2 won't display your metrics while you ride. Do you wish to turn Battery Saver off?"
Would you like to reset your currently connected device first (so others can use it)?
"You've already set your Home address. Do you want to replace it?"
"You've already set your Work address. Do you want to replace it?"
Reset current device and connect to new

Restarting your device connection will stop and relaunch the service that connects to your SmartHalo. It be can be useful if you cannot connect to your device or you do not see it in the devices list. Are you sure you want to restart your device connection?
"Please provide a description of an error: "
Are you sure you want to stop navigation?
Your Strava account is no longer linked
Your fitness rides will no longer be pushed to Strava automatically. Tap to reactivate.
"You can manually choose which rides you're sending to Strava from your fitness tab."
All of your future rides will automatically be sent to Strava.
"Are you sure you'd like to disconnect your Strava account from your SmartHalo account?"
Your Strava account has been disconnected.
Privacy : Your rides will be uploaded following your Strava privacy settings. Strava settings are automatically set as public. You can modify them in your Strava account.
SmartHalo is a touch surface. By using short or long taps, you can trigger features that you define here.
*Take note: To use these new features you must be on the latest firmware update.
This functionality can only be assigned to the 2 short taps quick touch
"Are you sure you'd like to override the current touch input for "%1$s
"Sorry, you can't override the light function at this time."
Are you sure you want to cancel this goal?
Life is better when you remember to set your goals.
Goals are not intended to be to things which are neither presently nor previously achieved.
